kit.leader_skill: Super TEQ Type Ki +2 and HP, ATK & DEF +70%

super_attack.name: Kamehameha
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Krillin's Flash of Brilliance
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) "Tournament Participants" Category allies' Ki +1 and DEF 20% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 20% up for characters who also belong to the "World Tournament" Category; When HP is 90% or less: ATK & DEF 100% up; When HP is 70% or less: ATK & DEF 100% up; When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 150% up; Great chance of ATK 200% up when HP is 50% or less; When there is a "Tournament Participants" Category enemy: ATK 30% up and DEF 40% up when attacking

lines.text: "Tournament Participants" Category allies' Ki +1 and DEF 20% up, plus an additional Ki +1 and ATK & DEF 20% up for characters who also belong to the "World Tournament" Category

lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Great chance of ATK 200% up when HP is 50% or less
lines.context: When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: ATK 30% up and DEF 40% up when attacking
lines.context: When there is a "Tournament Participants" Category enemy
